column1: Jon Brackenbook was a character created specifically for The Lord of the Rings Online.
He learnt that Calder Cob was a traitor
column4: did not believe him until it was too late. The Blackwolds attacked Archet and Jon came to the towns defense. During the attack Jons father was slain and Jon became captain of Archet.
